name: Yellow Submarine (Adriii)
description:
Besides the very very proof of concept, you can read this document where I explain the story and how they game would go. You can also download a PDF below.

CONTROLS: Keyboard arrows/space bar

-------------------------------------

Hi! :) I'm Adriana. I work on tv series development but as a narrative enthusiast I've been exploring and enjoying videogames so much. I have no other artistic or technical background so when I saw this Narrative Driven Jam, I started thinking about ideas I would explore if I knew how.

The CAGED IN theme really inspired me on a story that is very special and close to me. It is just an idea, a proof of concept if you will. It is me playing around with Bitsy to explore interactive ways of telling this story.

Thank you for reading, thank you for playing, and thank you for inspiring me to try something new and learn new things. Thanks to Rafa and his community for the much needed support and encouragement, and to DeLarge for introducing me to new tools :)

I'm going to keep working on it to try to make it properly so any feedback is most welcome!
